product_name: Nite Ize SaddleLite LED Bike Seat Bag
long_description: The Nite Ize SaddleLite LED bike seat bag offers enough room for levers, patch kits and a tube and includes a bright, weather-resistant LED to enhance visibility when you're riding in the dark. LED has 2 modes&38212;press once for steady glow and twice for continuous flash. Bag features recycled PET water-resistant fabric and has a roomy, bright white interior so you can easily find items. Interior mesh pocket holds credit cards, ID, keys, money and other small items. LED is removable so the bag can be washed without damaging the light. The attached flexible, reusable Gear Tie allows for safe, easy and adjustable seat post installation. Light runs for 20 hrs. on constant; 25 hrs. on flash; includes two 2016 3V lithium batteries. The Nite Ize SaddleLite LED bike seat bag comes with two replaceable 2016 lithium batteries.
short_description: The Nite Ize SaddleLite LED bike seat bag offers enough room for levers, patch kits and a tube and includes a bright, weather-resistant LED to enhance visibility when you're riding in the dark.
